price: 21. ¿Por qué no se postran cuando se les recita el Corán?[1129]
arabic: وَإِذَا قُرِئَ عَلَيۡهِمُ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانُ لَا يَسۡجُدُونَۤ۩
footnotes: [1129]  Ver la nota de la aleya 206 de la sura 7.

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā quri-a ʿalayhimu al-qur'ānu lā yasjudūna
